title: Profile
text:
Professional Highlights

Loyalty Coordinator – Keralty EPS Sanitas (2020–2024)

Drove over $46,000 in annual sales growth by expanding membership in the Premium Plan in Colombia.
Exceeded KPIs by 110% through strategic planning and customer engagement initiatives.
Designed and implemented customer retention strategies, enhancing loyalty for Premium Plan members.
Trained over 20 leaders and 300 employees on loyalty programs, products, and customer benefits.
Collaborated with 25+ partners to enhance loyalty benefits for 100,000 customers, managing $1 million annually in digital strategies to promote health product sales.



Insurance Manager – Insurance Risk Company (2019–2024)

Guided clients in finding tailored insurance solutions, collaborating with various insurance companies in Colombia.
Managed over 1,000 customer accounts independently, handling diverse policies, including life, health, auto, and home insurance.
Prospected and sold insurance products by presenting coverage options, pricing, and benefits to meet client needs.
Achieved a 95% average customer satisfaction rating.
Consistently increased insurance sales by 30% annually, contributing to company growth and targets.



Insurance Senior Rep – GM Financial Colombia (2015–2019)

Managed a portfolio of 42,000+ quarters/credit life automobile policy and 56,000+ credit life policy.
Built a commission of more than 6.5M yearly.
Developed new dealer training, new insurance products as well as incentives plans.



Corporate Analyst – Nueva EPS (2011–2015)

Re-developed business approaches and new broker relationships (AON, Willis, Delima).
Headed initiatives on product development and mass communication.

title: Profile
text:
Welcome to my site!!!
I am a Results-driven professional with an enrolment student in Master’s in Business Administration and over 10 years of experience in leadership, customer service, and financial management. Proven ability to drive sales growth, proficiency in exceeding customer service indicators, exceeding performance targets, and enhancing customer retention strategies. Expertise in managing loyalty programs and insurance portfolios and delivering tailored solutions. Skilled in training teams and collaborating with key stakeholders to optimize operations. Proficient with QuickBooks and strategic planning of business, customer satisfaction and efficiency.
